ygData.subject: Screaming Terror
ygData.msgSnippet: Just read they fixed the ?bug? letting you use it out side?? I take it that it is a dungeon only spell?  Also, doesn t that mean you can t use it in unrest.
ygData.messageBody:
Just read they fixed the ?bug? letting you use it out side?? I take it that
it is a dungeon only spell? Also, doesn't that mean you can't use it in
unrest. Seems kind of dumb in that if it resist the mem wipe it is a train
of death spell.

Xakthan
Lord of Shadows
Follower of the Crimson Knights
